title: GREENS Kitchen and Juicery
typeOfFood: Western, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Take-out wholefood kitchen, cold pressed juicery, and bakery located in the historical center, opened since mid-2014. Offers take away food including salads, wraps, soups, superfood smoothies, baked goods (gluten free/vegan), fair trade coffee, and a line of cold pressed juices. Hosts workshops.
